00015   // Refactor to make it generic to find linefeed (look behind)
00016   inline bool ends_with(std::string const & value, std::string const & ending)
00017   {
00018     if (ending.size() > value.size()) return false;
00019     return std::equal(ending.rbegin(), ending.rend(), value.rbegin());
00020   }
